jd: From: Vaibhav Raghuvanshi, TEK Inspirations vaibhav.raghuvanshi@tekinspirations.com Reply to: vaibhav.raghuvanshi@tekinspirations.com Hi,Hope you are doing great!!!Please share suitable profile and mention JOB Job Description -Title : ORACLE PL/SQL Developer About JOB Minimum 6 to 12 years’ Experience in product development Having good IT experience as an ORACLE PL/SQL Developer, involved in Requirement Gathering, analysis, Design, Development, Unit Testing, Production Deployment and Support.At least 4 years of experience in SQL and PL/SQL programming, developing complex code units.Solid Experience of creating PL/SQL Packages, Procedures, Functions, Triggers, Types, Views in Oracle.Knowledge of manufacturing processes. Knowledge on Steel/Aluminum industry process would be preferred.knowledge of ISA 95.knowledge of integration between MES , L2, ERP systems.Understanding and Collecting requirements from Business user side or Business Analyst and try to convert that requirement to PL SQL.Responsible for performance tuning activities in the project.Regards,Vaibhav
